page.title: 11Organisations in Dean
page.content: There are branches of several country-wide associations which meet in Upper Dean and whose members come from the surrounding villages: Women's Institute numbers about 30 members, meeting 1 a month in the village hall;the British Legion has a small active membership and holds an annual sale. Brownies for 7-10 year old girls was set up several years ago and meets weekly in term time. Several sports clubs make use of the ground, now owned by the village and to be called Dean Sports Ground. The football team play "friendly " games on Sunday mornings, the Young Farmers have a tug of war team that competes in local shows and the cricket team, whose records go back to the last century, play Bedfordshire League cricket on Saturdays.
